short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your 60-second business pitch - pitch perfect with this workbook.  Sell without selling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you network you need to perfect your 60-second business pitch.  This workbook gives you the tools to develop the perfect pitch that will get people wanting to work with you.

This is selling without selling.  Learn how to tell people about the problem you solve for them and watch them rush to work with you.

Getting this pitch perfect is the start of all your public speaking.  It introduces you and your business to people and tells them why they should work with you.
